title: Ticket #2021: Startup script can´t stop Condor (LINUX)
description:
We are testing Condor 7.5.6 in linux machines and when we try to stop the daemons using the /etc/init.d/Condor stopm, it gives the message

Condor not running

Taking a look into the script we found that it is failing to setup the $PS and $PSopts variables, perhaps because detect_pc() is not called into the script.

Could you provide a fixed script?
remarks: Sent the 7.6.0 version of the script off to Klaus for testing, waiting for feedback.
creator: nleroy
